lines.text: Well now, Sheriff, it's nice to know that you're out here on patrol.
No, no, I'm not on patrol. Just lookin' for an ice cream cone, that's all.
The taxes in this town pay your salary to protect the place.
Well, if anything happens to you, Lem, we'll give you a refund.
The best thing about turning over a new leaf on Saturday night is that it disappears with a Sunday morning hangover.
Bubber, let Jake walk forward. And if he's all right, I'll give you my car and see that you get out of here without anyone bothering you.
Shoot a man for sleeping with someone's wife? That's silly. Half the town'd be wiped out.
